net.xmind.XMind8 CC0-1.0 LicenseRef-proprietary=https://www.xmind.net/license/xpla/ XMind 8 Amazing brainstorming and mind mapping tool.
XMind, a full-featured mind mapping and brainstorming tool, designed to generate ideas, inspire creativity, brings you efficiency both in work and life. Tens of million people love it.
This is the version that based on Java and Eclipse platform.
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by XMind Ltd.
